originalText.text:
I called Diana after what felt like an extremely shady canine inspection by a different company. She was awesome: she was patient, listened to my concerns, and responded promptly when I reached out. Her inspection was everything the first companyâ€™s wasnâ€™t. In addition to bringing both Goosey and Ecko around my place (twice!), she did a thorough and extensive visual examination all while explaining everything she was doing. She even had a kit for detecting bedbug fecal matter! (The other company took all of 15 minutes and claimed that a blotchy rust stain on my mattress cover was a bedbug dropping). Itâ€™s obvious that she keeps up with all the research and knowledge her field has to offer. She didnâ€™t find any signs and no bed bugs were detected, but shared a wealth of videos and photos of bed bugs droppings with me so I know what to look out for. She also gave me tips for monitoring.

Iâ€™ve had bedbugs twice and itâ€™s left me with heightened paranoia and anxiety. I am so thankful not only for Dianaâ€™s expertise, but also for her patience and understanding. If you suspect you have bedbugs (and I truly hope you donâ€™t), I urge you to use her services.

originalText.text: Diana and her adorable dog Southie came to my home the same day I called with bed bug concerns. Diana was very professional, sweet and lovely to work with. Southie was adorable and thoroughly sniffed every inch of my house. Diana even gave me a recommendation to purchase Thermal Strike to avoid bringing bed bugs into my home in the future. I would 100% call Dr. Sniffs again (though I hope to not need themðŸ˜­). Thank you Diana and Southie!!

originalText.text: Diana is an absolute pleasure! She is extremely responsive and knowledgeable regarding this somewhat unpleasant and stressful topic. I am so grateful for her expertise and quick replyâ€™s! She has put me at ease time and time again when I have consulted her to analyze a bug picture. 100% recommend this business!

She has put me at ease time and time again when I have consulted her to analyze a bug picture. 100% recommend this business!

originalText.text: From the very beginning, the Doctor  Sniffs team was so helpful and knowledgeable. The initial phone call with Rick was informative and put me at ease; he answered all of my questions and made me feel like the company had my back, which helped alleviate my anxiety. Diana, who performed the inspection with her dog Southy, was extremely communicative, professional, sincere, and supportive, which was reassuring. The inspection was thorough and Diana offered a lot of insight and resources for bed bug prevention. There was a follow-up via text which I appreciated. And 6 months later, when I found a bug casing in a hotel, Diana was kind enough to do a bug identification via text and put my mind at ease. The stress that even the possibility of having bed bugs creates is immense and Rick and Diana make you feel that you are not going through it alone, no matter what they may or may not find. And their support and care last even after the inspection ends.

originalText.text:
I canâ€™t recommend Doctor Sniffs enough. If youâ€™re concerned or worried you might have a bedbug problem, Doctor Sniffs is the first and best plan of attack.

I have lived in NYC for over 20 years and have been traumatized by bedbugs. Iâ€™ve had to deal with them three times, and I know how well they can blow up your life in so many ways.
Recently, I had cause for concern that I might have a problem again. I found some bites near my ear on July 3rd, 2023. With a little bit of looking around online, I found Doctor Sniffs, and was impressed with the pedigree and personality and positive reviews I saw. I made the call for inspection, and Diana and Southy were at my apartment first thing on July 4th (of all days). I *SO* appreciated the willingness to come through on such short notice.
Dianaâ€™s inspection was thorough, and she was more than willing to accommodate my questions and concerns. Unfortunately I did have a little problem at my place, but I was fortunate enough to catch the problem early.
Diana had great recommendations on next steps, all of which have been helpful and effective, and best of all I have been able to maintain a much more viable and efficient way of living my life, despite having to deal with a bedbug problem. There ARE better methods than the old ways of treatment, but you have to go with people who know what theyâ€™re doing and are using the most efficient and effective methods of the day. Most inspectors and exterminators do not.
Doctor Sniffs is absolutely who you want if youâ€™re worried you might have a problem.

Diana has been amazing with follow up and has been super helpful with treatment recommendations. If you HAVE to deal with bedbugs, itâ€™s incredibly helpful to have somebody like Diana who is on point both professionally and personally.
As Iâ€™ve mentioned before, Iâ€™ve dealt with other inspectors and exterminators and I know the difference. Doctor Sniffs is THE way to go.
